note.p: Schoolteacher. Government certified schoolteacher in Galgate and Failsworth, Lancashire. Emigrated to America, 1881/2.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/4228/113/9), 1881 (RG11/4028/59/24)
England, select births and christenings, 1538–1975 (Ancestry.com, accessed 15 September 2015)
North Carolina, wills and probate records, 1665–1998 (Ancestry.com, accessed 17 September 2015)
